hero.title: Aj Serwis
hero.heroUnderTitle: Effortlessly find job opportunities in Poland. Experience a fast and efficient job search process

list_text.who_are_we_text: We are a leading Polish advisory company specialized in employee outsourcing. We started our operations in 2017, recognizing the opportunity to help companies meet their staffing needs, primarily by sourcing employees from Eastern Europe.
list_text.our_goals_text: In 2022, as one of the first companies in the Polish market, we expanded our operations to include employees from the Philippines. Our ambition is to provide the highest level of services that surpass the market and set a new standard. We continuously focus on the high competence of our team, which guarantees quality, efficiency, and effectiveness in the processes we manage
list_text.why_trust_text: Why should you trust us? Over 100 companies, including leaders in the FMCG industry, have placed their trust in us. We have employed over 10,000 workers, and our differentiator is speed of action. Orders for up to 200 employees are most commonly fulfilled within 2 weeks from signing the contract.

surname.max: Surname must be no more than 35 characters long

phone.min: Phone number must be at least 6 characters long
phone.max: Phone number must be no more than 18 characters long

comment.max: Comment or review must be no more than 250 characters long
